column4: you guys aware of problems with vmlinuz-2.6.20-16-generic and nvidia? i dont feel like investigating so ill just use 15 kernel instead
If you reinstall the drivers there is generally no issue, the best bet is uninstall, update, reinstall, but a lot of people are just sticking to 15
yeah i manually installed with same issue. i used nvidia.sh first actually and package and old kernel last resort
I upgraded on my desktop which is an nvdia with no worries, but I am still hesitant to make the jump on my laptop as I hear it causes issues...although I am running an intel chipset over here.
